resources.string: One million Earthes can fit inside the Sun.
There are more trees on Earth than stairs in the Milky Way.
Space is completly silent.
Space is full of space junk.
The center of the Milky Way galaxy has tens of thousands of black holes.
You lose out on a third of your taste buds during flights.
Pilots and co-pilots are required to eat different meals.
You lose 8 ounces of water from your body for every hour you fly.
Most people around the world have never set foot on a plane.
Locked plane bathrooms aren’t really locked.
Grasses make up about 26% of the plant life on earth.
About 1,400 species of grasses exist in the United States.
Giant bamboo, which can grow up to 151 feet tall, is the largest variety of grass.
Grass is green because of the chlorophyll in it.
Grass is used to make alcohol.
There are more than 50,000 cities in the world.
Megacities are cities with more than 10 million people living in them.
Tokyo is the most populated city in the world, with more than 38 million people.
New York is the biggest city in the world, with 8,683 km² in area.
The Vatican City is the smallest city in the world, with only 44 hectares in area.
Napoléon was short.
Don’t eat and swim.
Dogs sweat by salivating.
Einstein failed maths.
Humans and dinosaurs were in the same era.
Vaccines cause autism.
Most birds have a limited sense of smell, so they won’t abandon babies who “smell” of humans.
Caffeine dehydrates you.
You can see the Great Wall of China from space.
Cracking your knuckles will give you arthritis.
Walt Disney\'s body is cryogenically frozen.
When briefed on those suffering in her kingdom, Marie Antoinette replied \"Let them eat cake.\"
Adam and Eve eat an apple.
All you fingernails grow in the same rate.
The Sun is yellow.
About 5% of the earth\'s wildlife is found in the ocean.
There are more than 10 species of sharks in the ocean.
The Pacific Ocean is narrow than the moon.
Oceans don\'t have lakes and rivers.
If all the ice melted, nothing will happen.
